Posts.EditableText:
Really strange bug here...
When testing a game through quest with the aslx file(The one with debugging and everything else) The option to undo seems to be disabled(Grayed out)

However, It seems to work totally fine when i publish the game and play it directly from the quest file...
Posts.HTML:
Really strange bug here...
When testing a game through quest with the aslx file(The one with debugging and everything else) The option to undo seems to be disabled(Grayed out)

However, It seems to work totally fine when i publish the game and play it directly from the quest file...
